name: Spectrum (itch) (bustingjam)
description:
Enter the color Dimensions  to solve the puzzles!

>The Game Uses Ambient Lights for color change<

Game can be played in android  and windows

for windows you have to open the app in  blue stacks 

windows controls 

W,A,S,D  movements

arrow keys for color change

this is a puzzle game made in box2d and opengl

the game was inspired from Hue the game
